cast.name: 塞蕾娜·威廉姆斯 Serena Williams
维纳斯·威廉姆斯 Venus Williams

introduction: After 27 years in professional tennis, Serena Williams shares a personal account of her most meaningful Grand Slam appearances and deconstructs the milestones of her legendary career. Each episode explores the pivotal moments in Serena’s life on and off the court, illustrating the series of steps that when reflected upon, show the incredible distance traveled over the course of her career.在职业网球生涯 27 年后，塞雷娜・威廉姆斯分享了她最有意义的大满贯赛事的个人经历，并解构了她传奇职业生涯的里程碑。每一集都探讨了塞雷娜球场内外生活中的关键时刻，展示了一系列步骤，反思这些步骤，展示了她在职业生涯中走过的令人难以置信的距离。
